content.question: A research team plans to study the correlation between genetic predisposition to and incidence of schizophrenia. Which of the following variables would be of most direct interest to this research team as they study this correlation?

choices.label: Environmental exposure to biological relatives and the number of symptoms of schizophrenia displayed
The number of siblings a person has
The severity of the illness and the number of environmental stressors
Similarity rates of diagnosis in family members and how much genetic material they share

content.answer: Similarity rates of diagnosis in family members and how much genetic material they share

skill.text: 2.C: Evaluate the appropriate use of research design elements in non-experimental methodologies.
